data.comment: The match is underway at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 1, Benevento to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Benevento.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Federico Dionisi.
In the minute 7, Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Goal! Fabio Quagliarella gives Sampdoria a 1-0 lead.
Federico Bonazzoli with an assist there.
In the minute 10, Benevento have a dangerous throw-in.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Benevento at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Benevento have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Benevento.
Can Sampdoria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benevento's half?
In the minute 15, The match at Luigi Ferraris has been interrupted briefly for a check on Daam Foulon, who is down injured.
Benevento's Daam Foulon is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 17, Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
In Genoa, Federico Bonazzoli of Sampdoria is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Federico Dionisi.
In the minute 18, Goal! Omar Colley extends Sampdoria lead to 2-0 with a header.
Antonio Candreva instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
In the minute 21, Benevento drive forward but Gianluca Caprari is judged offside.
Sampdoria are pushing forward but Jakub Jankto's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Benevento at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 22, Federico Dionisi awards the away team a throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Genoa to check on Daam Foulon, who is grimacing with pain.
Daam Foulon is back on the pitch.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gabriele Moncini (Benevento) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 25, Benevento have been awarded a corner by Federico Dionisi.
Federico Dionisi signals a throw-in for Benevento, close to Sampdoria's area.
Throw-in for Benevento close to the penalty box.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Benevento.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kamil Glik for Benevento who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Lorenzo Tonelli is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 30, Beneventoâ€™s Kamil Glik is on his feet again at Luigi Ferraris.
Federico Dionisi awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Sampdoria's Lorenzo Tonelli looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 32, Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Benevento.
Tommaso Augello (Sampdoria) has received a first yellow card.
In Genoa Benevento drive forward through Bryan Dabo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Benevento.
Luca Caldirola strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Luigi Ferraris.
Sampdoria will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Benevento.
In the minute 36, Gianluca Caprari (Benevento) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Gianluca Caprari for Benevento gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick Sampdoria.
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Sampdoria.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
In the minute 39, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Federico Dionisi waits before resuming play because Omar Colley for Sampdoria is still down.
Omar Colley has recovered and rejoins the match in Genoa.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Genoa.
Throw-in for Benevento at Luigi Ferraris.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
In the minute 45, Benevento's Bryan Dabo misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Benevento.
The first-half has come to a close in Genoa.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Federico Dionisi signals a Benevento throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
Throw-in Benevento.
In the minute 47, Roberto Insigne of Benevento gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 48, Lorenzo Tonelli (Sampdoria) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gabriele Moncini.
Gabriele Moncini for Benevento is back on the field again.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benevento's half?
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
Federico Dionisi awards the away team a throw-in.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Benevento push forward at Luigi Ferraris and Gabriele Moncini gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sampdoria defence.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Sampdoria just outside Benevento's area.
In the minute 56, Bryan Dabo is booked for the away team.
Federico Dionisi awards the away team a throw-in.
Morten Thorsby is on a sub for Valerio Verre for Sampdoria.
In the minute 59, The away team replace Bryan Dabo with Riccardo Improta.
Sampdoria make their second substitution with Fabio Depaoli replacing Antonio Candreva.
Sampdoria drive upfield and Federico Bonazzoli gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Benevento defender.
In the minute 60, Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sampdoria have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Benevento at Luigi Ferraris.
Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Can Benevento capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sampdoria's half?
In the minute 63, Claudio Ranieri is making the team's third substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Gaston Ramirez replacing Federico Bonazzoli.
Federico Dionisi awards Benevento a goal kick.
Benevento's Gianluca Caprari breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 65, Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Sampdoria's Jakub Jankto has run offside.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 67, Fabio Quagliarella for Sampdoria is whistled offside.
Federico Dionisi signals a throw-in for Benevento, close to Sampdoria's area.
Benevento to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
In the minute 69, Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Benevento.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, In Genoa Benevento attack through Gabriele Moncini. The finish is off target, however.
Federico Dionisi awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Federico Dionisi.
In the minute 72, Goal! Luca Caldirola (Benevento) levels the score at 2-2 with a header.
That's a fine assist from Gianluca Caprari.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 74, Federico Dionisi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 75, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gianluca Lapadula is replacing Gabriele Moncini for the away team.
Filippo Inzaghi (Benevento) is making a third substitution, with Marco Sau replacing Gianluca Caprari.
Throw-in Benevento.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Benevento.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Benevento in the half of Sampdoria.
Fabio Quagliarella of Sampdoria is pulled up for offside.
Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Benevento have an attacking throw-in.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Perparim Hetemaj is on a sub for Daam Foulon for Benevento.
The away team have replaced Roberto Insigne with Alessandro Tuia. This is the fifth substitution made today by Filippo Inzaghi.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Fabio Depaoli (Sampdoria) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Manolo Gabbiadini is replacing Fabio Quagliarella for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Sampdoria's Fabio Depaoli has run offside.
Agony for Sampdoria as Manolo Gabbiadini 's header comes back off the post and is cleared.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Federico Dionisi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Goal! Benevento have got their heads in front thanks to a Gaetano Letizia strike.
Great play from Marco Sau to set up the goal.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, At Luigi Ferraris, Gaston Ramirez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Benevento at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in Benevento.
Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Genoa.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Benevento defender.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Federico Dionisi.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sampdoria's Omar Colley gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Full-time! The final score is 2-3.
